column1: Uchi////Although they've become busier in the last couple of months
column2: their service is always great. I used to be able to come and get in line at 4:45 without a reservation
column3: but the last two times I tried it was a fail
column4: so I would definitely recommend making reservations ahead of time. But overall
column5: this place has redeemed itself and earned #1 on my list again
